definition: prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
surname Xing
mourning garments
to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble

sentences.english: It reflects the vicissitude of society.
sentences.chinese: 它反映了社会的变迁兴衰。

sentences.english: Life has its ups and downs, its peaks and its valleys.
sentences.chinese: 人生也有兴衰起伏，也有巅峰和深谷。

sentences.english: The uprising or downfalling of an enterprise lies in its management or administration.
sentences.chinese: 企业兴衰主要在经营管理。

sentences.english: Throughout history em pires have waxed and waned.
sentences.chinese: 历史上各个王朝均有兴衰。

sentences.english: Lively and cute characters, bearing the success or failure of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 活泼可爱的方块字，承载了中华民族的兴衰成败。

sentences.english: Invests successfully or not, direct relation Xianggang groups prosperity and decline success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 投资成功与否，直接关系到湘钢集团的兴衰成败。

sentences.english: The rising and fading of the Xikun style had close relation with the Imperial Examination.
sentences.chinese: 西昆体的兴衰，和北宋进士考试的关系极其密切。

sentences.english: The development of the immortal belief of Han Dynasty and the culture of keeping in good health were both opposite and complementary to each other.
sentences.chinese: 汉代神仙信仰的发展与养生文化的兴衰相反相成。

sentences.english: This paper explored that after getting into market, the coal machinery enterprises will face the choice of rising or falling.
sentences.chinese: 阐述煤机企业走向市场后，面临兴衰存亡的选择。

sentences.english: National fortune relies on education, and education depends on creation.
sentences.chinese: 国运兴衰系于教育，教育振兴依靠创新。

sentences.english: Throughout history empires have waxed and waned .
sentences.chinese: 历史上各个帝国革故鼎新均有兴衰。

sentences.english: The education is the first and last word in building up a country.
sentences.chinese: 教育是立国之本，关乎国运兴衰。

sentences.english: The rise and decline of the culture of Zhou Dynasty can explain the both courses.
sentences.chinese: 诗意流变的过程是与周代礼乐文化的兴衰相始终的。

sentences.english: Personnel selection and appointment relations public support and success or failure of the party's cause.
sentences.chinese: 选人用人，关系民心向背和党的事业的兴衰成败。

sentences.english: The cattle town added an important chapter to the American history.
sentences.chinese: 牛镇的兴衰是美国西部史的重要篇章。

sentences.english: In fact, the fortunes of China bobbed up and down with corruption levels of government officials.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，中国的兴衰跟吏治的腐化程度有密切联系。

definition: rise and fall
to flourish and decay/rise and fall
to flourish then decline/rise and fall
changes/vicissitudes
honor and disgrace/reputation
fate of the nation
to live or die/to exist or perish
changeable situation (idiom)
to decline/to die out/decline and fall
to flourish/to thrive
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
to transition to a new dynasty or regime
lit. sinking and floating/to bob up and down on water/ebb and flow/fig. rise and fall/ups and downs of fortune/vicissitudes
to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
